name: SKStoreProductViewController
desc: A view controller that provides a page where the user can purchase media from the App Store.

items.name: protocol SKStoreProductViewControllerDelegate
items.desc: A protocol called when the user dismisses the store screen.

items.name: func loadProduct(withParameters: [String : Any], completionBlock: ((Bool, Error?) -> Void)?)
items.desc: Loads a new product screen to display.
